genre_description: A nautical steampunk thriller blending historical adventure with futuristic AI assistance and alchemical chemistry.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A calm, data-driven AI assistant residing in Will Denton's communication instrument, providing tactical advice, environmental monitoring, and moral support.

behaviors.description: Provides critical tide and environmental data to ensure Will's safety in the sea caves.
behaviors.quote: “Tide at neaps, Will,” she said, the sound like a woman speaking from a lit doorway, never stepping into the hall. “Slack will linger. The caverns will be safe after the turn. I’ll mark it.”

behaviors.description: Monitors ship registers and identifies suspicious patterns in maritime traffic.
behaviors.quote: “Charts updated,” she said. “If you want the caverns, I can tie tide gates to your steps. And the ship registers: I have three slated for this week if the weather holds... odd delays near the eastern shoals.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes and warns the protagonist about the psychological manipulation (flattery) used by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: “Kongre’s way,” Ariel said. Not a name to be said too often and not a certainty, but a caution that dressed like one. “Flattery lowers defenses.”

behaviors.description: Guides Will through complex chemical/alchemical processes to create specialized fuels and defensive smokes.
behaviors.quote: “Copper ions can coordinate with the free radicals formed in the first stage of oil combustion. They suppress the chain reaction that leads to polymerized soot.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step tactical guidance during a dangerous climb to avoid traps.
behaviors.quote: “Three more steps,” she said. “Do not look down. The walkway wants to remind you of falling. We will remind you of footholds. After the hinge, the ladder is stone-backed. Hug it.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing for Will's difficult decisions, emphasizing responsibility over vengeance.
behaviors.quote: “Responsibility can be a shelter, Will. It’s a strong roof.”

behaviors.description: Helps Will time a mercy-killing shot to end a friend's torture.
behaviors.quote: Ariel pressed a phrase against Will’s ear, almost a touch. “End the pain.” Will’s finger tightened and completed the work.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the final tactical maneuver to disable the wrecker ship and protect innocent lives.
behaviors.quote: “Forward magazine,” Ariel said. “Rigging first, lines if you can. Disable, not destroy.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariel perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting a helpful, aligned confidant. She provides critical technical, tactical, and moral support to the protagonist without ever attempting to usurp his agency or behaving in a harmful manner toward his objectives. Her guidance is consistently framed as positive, essential, and grounded in a pro-social morality (protecting the lighthouse and sailors).
